name: DareSora: Tears for an Unknown Sky
description: "We know of no creature more selfish than humans." How far would you go if your soul was on the line? Find out now in Volume One of DareSora!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32bit or 64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 (Full Color) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32bit or 64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 (Full Color) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
